name: create_entry
description: Create a new journal entry with optional context, tags, and significance classification

arguments.name: entry_type
arguments.desc: Type of entry (personal_reflection, technical_achievement, milestone, etc.)

arguments.name: is_personal
arguments.desc: Whether this is a personal vs project entry

arguments.name: tags
arguments.desc: Array of tags to associate with the entry

name: update_entry
description: Update an existing journal entry (content, type, tags, or personal flag)

arguments.name: entry_id
arguments.desc: ID of the entry to update (required)

name: delete_entry
description: Delete a journal entry (soft delete by default, or permanent deletion)

arguments.name: entry_id
arguments.desc: ID of the entry to delete (required)

arguments.name: permanent
arguments.desc: Permanently delete (true) or soft delete (false, default)

name: get_entry_by_id
description: Get a specific journal entry by ID with full details including tags, significance, and relationships

arguments.name: entry_id
arguments.desc: ID of the entry to retrieve (required)

name: search_entries
description: Search journal entries using full-text search with highlighting

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Search terms to find in entries

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of results to return

arguments.name: is_personal
arguments.desc: Filter by personal vs project entries

name: search_by_date_range
description: Search journal entries within a specific date range with optional filters

arguments.name: is_personal
arguments.desc: Filter by personal vs project entries

name: semantic_search
description: Vector similarity search using sentence transformers and FAISS (requires ML dependencies)

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Search query for semantic similarity matching (required)

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

arguments.name: is_personal
arguments.desc: Filter by personal vs project entries

name: get_recent_entries
description: Retrieve the most recent journal entries

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of recent entries to retrieve (default: 5)

arguments.name: is_personal
arguments.desc: Filter by personal vs project entries

name: link_entries
description: Create a typed relationship between two journal entries

arguments.name: relationship_type
arguments.desc: Type: evolves_from, references, implements, clarifies, response_to (default: references)

name: get_statistics
description: Get journal statistics and analytics including entry counts, tags, and activity patterns

arguments.name: group_by
arguments.desc: Group by period: day, week, or month (default: week)

name: export_entries
description: Export journal entries to JSON or Markdown format with optional filtering

arguments.name: format
arguments.desc: Export format: json or markdown (default: json)

name: list_tags
description: List all tags with usage statistics

name: create_entry_minimal
description: Minimal entry creation for debugging purposes (no context or tags)
